Egyptian Preparatory Committee for Commemorating DPRK's Important Days Formed 
   Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Egyptian Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2007 was held in the building of the Egypt-DPRK Friendship Association on Nov. 6. 
 The ceremony elected the vice-chairman of the National Democratic Party of Egypt chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee decided to set the period from November 6, 2006 to April 20, 2007 as a period for commemorations and hold a meeting, photo exhibition, film show, lecture and cultural and art events during the period.

articles.title: Concert for Peace Held in Seoul
articles.content:
GNP's Shameless Behavior Denounced in S. Korea 
   Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement released on Nov. 7 reportedly accused the Grand National Party of south Korea of shamelessly slandering the Pyongyang visit paid by a delegation of the Democratic Workers' Party of south Korea. 
 The statement recalled that the GNP gentry let loose a string of vituperation about the delegation's visit to Mangyongdae during its stay in Pyongyang and found fault even with the looks on the faces of the members of the delegation when they were posing for a photo there.     
 The reckless behavior of the GNP gentry suggests that what they want is not peace on the Korean Peninsula but confrontation and war, the statement said, calling upon all the Koreans to turn out in the actions to force the GNP to dismantle itself as it is a political party advocating a war and a treacherous political party, and thus achieve peace and reunification.

Concert for Peace Held in Seoul 
   Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- A "Concert for Peace" was reportedly held in Seoul on Nov. 9 under the sponsorship of the "Headquarters of the Movement of Koreans for Becoming One."
 Put on the stage were colorful pieces on the theme of peace and national reunification prepared by different cultural and art organizations including the literature and art troupe of the Reunification Committee of the "National Teachers Union" and the song troupe "Our Country."    
 The concert that started on Oct. 26 has been held every Thursday and will run through Nov. 30.

Greetings to Chief of Palestinian National Authority
   Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings Tuesday to Mahmoud Abbas, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization and chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of the proclamation of the Palestinian State.
 The message wholeheartedly wished the Palestinian people success in accomplishing their just cause of retaking the legitimate national rights including the right to founding an independent state.

Gift to Leader Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the head of the delegation of the Union of Mongolian Architects on a visit to the DPRK.
 It was handed to an official concerned by Vice-President of the UMA Tseveenravdan Batbayar who is heading the delegation.
